title: Dermablend Camo Confessions - Cassandra
description:
Cassandra shares how acne affected her life. Dermablend® Professional helps to “blend in to stand out”. 

Shop at HSN: https://www.hsn.com/shop/dermablend/10740

asset.title: HSN | Dermablend Camo Confessions- Cassandra on beating the bullies
asset.description:
We all have something to cover. 
Let's TAKE IT OFF. Together.
WHAT'S YOUR CAMO CONFESSION?

We all have something to cover. In fact 60% of Americans have a skin concern that they would consider camouflaging with cosmetics. Today, Dermablend® Professional dares you to take it off and reveal your camouflage through Camo Confessions, a YouTube initiative that empowers and enables men and women who have overcome skin related obstacles to “blend in to stand out”. This uplifting campaign reveals the intimate confessions of how people have used Dermablend cosmetics to “blend in”, camouflaging their imperfections or tattoos and thus allowing them to “stand out” for who they are and not for their skin concern.
 
 
Dermablend launches the campaign by collaborating with three influencers who will have you captivated by the reveal of what they have camouflaged; however, it is their inner confidence and proven successes that make you look past their imperfections and celebrate their accomplishments

Dermablend encourages people to get involved and share their confession to inspire others!
 
Skin does not reflect who you are on the inside. Don’t let other people’s judgments get in your way. Be bold and reach your goals!
 
Created by an American dermatologist, Dermablend Professional has been recognized as the expert in camouflage cosmetics since 1981. Today, Dermablend is the #1 dermatologist recommended camouflage brand. Whatever your coverage need, camouflage it flawlessly with Dermablend.
asset.author: HSN
